title: Scott of the Antarctic
creator_credit: Charles Frend, Sir Michael Balcon and Rank Film Productions
brief_description: Saga of the ill fated 1912 expedition led by Captain Robert Scott which aimed to be the first to reach the South Pole. Features John Mills, James Robertson Justice and Kenneth Moore.
